overview: Can a few good veggies stand against an army of thousands? Can a nation be defended by horns and flashlights? Find out in the hilarious new adventure from VeggieTales, Gideon Tuba Warrior. It's a tale of courage and trust as a reluctant , tuba playing warrior takes on an army of excessively hairy pickles!
tagline: Can a few good veggies stand against an army of thousands?
title: VeggieTales: Gideon - Tuba Warrior
